1636952225_1BWgyS5ThxyuzEWWj2dats3sgQBpp.body: All of the money for his trial and bail has already been spent.  IIRC there's been plenty collected, and apparently Robert Barnes wasted 100k on jury selection experts that wasn't even used.  If you feel like spending some money I'd suggest giving it to actual free speech platforms, maybe gab and odysee.

1636765653_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
It's hard to trust any perspective that demonizes "identity politics", as this is a simple way of redefining ethnocentrism.  We know that trust drops in areas where the ethnos is attacked, not only between separate ethnic groups but also among the same ethnic group.  It is no coincidence that much of the actions of globalism against everyone is happening now after decades of deconstructing this racial/ethnic solidarity.

Of course, ethnic solidarity is only one of the defenses against the globo/zio/banker cartel.  Strong family ties, and yes class ties can also help groups hold fast against outside attacks.  What's the best way to revive a class consciousness, and how do we "weaponize" it against enemies?
